snippet: Dominique Brown’s 15-yard touchdown run in the third quarter and Gerald Christian’s 10-yard touchdown catch late in the fourth followed a big defensive performance that helped Louisville beat Miami, 31-13.
abstract: Louisville beats Miami, 31-13, in college football action.
lead_paragraph: Dominique Brown’s 15-yard touchdown run in the third quarter and Gerald Christian’s 10-yard touchdown catch late in the fourth followed a big defensive performance that helped Louisville beat Miami, 31-13.
